titles: By the Queenes commaundement forasmuch as it is found by good proofe, that many persons which haue serued of late on the  seas, in the iourney towardes Spayne and Portingall, in comming from Plimmouth, and other portes ... haue fallen sicke by the way, and diuers died as infected with the plague ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
publisher: By the Deputies of Christopher Barker, Printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,
notes: Last complete line of text ends "bee".
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Medical laws and legislation --  England --  Early works to 1800.
